name: Iron granny 2: Scary Games Mod 2019
description:
Horror Iron granny game - Scary Games Mod is a new version with beautiful graphics and sound.

Iron granny startling is the proprietor of the house, Iron granny is separated from everyone else so she needs to keep you secured in the house. Your assignment is must discover some keys and discover the exit from her home called BARBIE GRANNY.

Horror Iron granny the door out is locked and you need to find ways to get out in 5 days. You have to try to get out of rich house, but be careful and quiet.

Features Horror Ironwoman granny - Scary Games Mod:

- A fearful atmosphere with realistic graphics
- Horror and interesting game levels
- Live in the horrific horror stories and feel the scream sounds
- Horror game 2019 he world of mayhem teclado labirinto Drag left and ideal to keep away from
